I have faced similar problems with Regex Filters.

I have a filter

.*\\.(jpg|png|pdf|doc|mpeg|mpg|gif|swf|tiff|exe|bin|ico)$

to block all these extensions in a MatchesRegexList Decide Rule and on
a Match I reject them.

but then I see the odd .gif and .jpg being placed in the frontier, its
a bit wierd, coz it does'nt seem to happen for all of them.

Anmol
